# Battle of Junín order of battle__disambig_1

The order of battle proceeded as follows:
Commander in Chief
]]
*  Simón Bolívar
Cavalry Corps
*  Commander (Mariano Necochea)
*    2 Squadrons of the Gran Colombia Horse Grenadiers, Commander Lucas Carvajal
*    3 Squadrons, Colombian Hussars, Commander José Laurencio Silva
*    1 Squadron from the Regiment of Mounted Grenadiers, Commander Alexis Bruix
*    3 Squadrons from Hussars of Perú, Commander William Miller
Infantry Corps
1º Division of Colombia (Lara)
* Battalion Vencedores, jefe Ignacio Luque
* Battalion Batalla Pantano de Vargas, jefe José Trinidad Moran
* Battalion Rifles, Commander Arthur Sandes
2º Division of Colombia (Córdova)
* Battalion Bogotá, jefe León Galindo
* Battalion Voltígeros, jefe Pedro Guash
* Battalion Pichincha, jefe Manuel León
* Battalion Caracas, jefe José Leal
División of Perú (La Mar)
* Battalion Línea número 1, jefe Francisco de Paula Otero
* Battalion Línea número 2 (Trujillo), jefe Ramón Gonzales
* Battalion Línea número 3 (Callao), jefe Miguel Benavides
* Battalion Legión Peruana, jefe José María Plaza
| col2 =
Commander in Chief
.]]
* José de Canterac
Cavalry Corps
* Commander (Gómez de Bedoya)
*  3 Squadrons Dragones de La Unión
*  1 Squadrons Húsares de Fernando VII
*  4 Squadrons Dragones del Perú
Infantry Corps
1º Division (Maroto)
* Battalion Real Infante (Real de Lima)
* Battalion Burgos
* Battalion Cantabria
* Battalion 1º Imperial Alejandro (Extremadura)
2º Division (Monet)
* Battalion Castro (Chiloé)
* Battalion Victoria (Talavera)
* Battalion Guías del General (del Alto Perú)
* Battalion Centro (Azángaro)
* Battalion 2º Cuzco
